channel.title: How do i remove items from shop

item.title: How do i remove items from shop
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

You go into shops.cfg, then you search for the shop you are trying to edit.
More than likely you have alot of shops in the shops.cfg, the best way to slim it down is search for the itemID of the item you wish to remove. Lets say you wanna take out a whip, so press ctrl+F, and search for 4151, then make sure thats the right shop.
It shud look something like thisâ€¦

shop = 1     exampleshop   2   2   4151 100

the 4151 is the item id, and to the right of it will be an amount which you also MUST make sure you get rid of.
Otherwise, the shop will think the 100 is the itemID and the next itemID will become the amount and so on and so forth.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i remove items from shop
